name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say It So: Add voice comments in Google Docs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say It Better with Voice Comments in Google Doc. Perfect for - feedback, explanations, and collaboration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say It So - Voice Comments for Google Docs

Simplify collaboration and communication with voice comments in Google Docs
Say It So is a Chrome extension that allows you to add voice comments to your Google Docs, making it easier than ever to provide clear, personalized feedback and explanations to your team.

Benefits:
Save time by recording voice notes instead of typing lengthy comments
Provide clearer, more nuanced feedback by speaking your mind
Strengthen collaboration by adding a personal touch to your communication
Avoid confusion and ensure your message is understood the first time
